rightcol.p: There is a mailing list for discussions about xindy, proposals, and other interesting stuff. Tell us your experiences and bring your ideas into this project! Simply send a mail to
containing the word subscribe in its body and you'll be with us! You will receive an email that asks for confirmation of your subscription, to combat spam.
Address of the mailing list itself, for contributions, is
You need to be subscribed to send email; the spam problem forces us to use this configuration.
It is planned to move the mailing list to Sourceforge, as the mail domain iti.informatik.tu-darmstadt.de will be shut down.
Mails from 1997 to 2000 are available as mail archive. We hope to reestablish an archive after moving the mailing list to Sourceforge.
